description: Furniture assembly priced per item type, with a minimum visit fee.
questions: What type of furniture needs to be assembled (bed, dresser, table, etc.)?
Is the furniture new in box, or partially assembled/disassembled?
Will the work be done in an apartment, house, or office (any access issues)?
operator_guidance: Estimate total by multiplying item counts by their unit prices, then enforce the minimum_visit_price.
For complex items (Murphy beds, large wardrobes), treat as multiple standard items or add a safety margin.
Communicate clearly what is included (assembly only vs. moving/anchoring to walls).
